lead_paragraph: The fake snow surrounding the rink was only intended for decoration. Certainly made for a nice blizzard, though, when the whipping wind caught hold of the cotton-like substance and sent it flying everywhere.

headline.print_headline: Richards Helps Red Wings to 5-3 Win Over Avs in Outdoor Game
headline.main: Richards Helps Red Wings to 5-3 Win Over Avs in Outdoor Game
